Notes

Scheduled release date was RSD 2018 but was delayed due to mastering/pressing issues. Limited colored vinyl one-time pressing of 1,500 Recorded at Echo Studios, Los Angeles, CA Mastered at Cohearent Audio, Los Angeles, CA Plating and Pressing by Record Technology Inc. Audio source: 44.1/16 final mix files A Blue Note Records release; ℗ 2010 © 2018 Capitol Records, LLC.
